nodes.text: The Vagaari were a species active near the Chiss Ascendancy in the Unknown Regions. A group of Vagaari pirates came into conflict with the Chiss, and Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo led unauthorized operations that, while successful in a military sense, were a political disaster, with Syndic Mitth'ras'safis left dead. Thrawn was left to recover from his injuries on Naporar, and Supreme Admiral Ja'fosk of the Ascendancy was displeased with his actions.
The Vagaari were known to conquer other aliens and adapt their technology; typically making major modifications that could be seen from the bridge of a starship outside of combat range.
